text: Round Trip to Mars is the 80th animated cartoon short subject in the Woody Woodpecker series. Released theatrically on September 23, 1957, the film was produced by Walter Lantz Productions and distributed by Universal International. ==References== *Cooke, Jon, Komorowski, Thad, Shakarian, Pietro, and Tatay, Jack. "1957". The Walter Lantz Cartune Encyclopedia. title: Round Trip to Mars
